short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and post Unicode on the WELL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension is specifically for Engaged users on [The WELL](https://www.well.com), it does nothing on any other website. It enables viewing and posting all Unicode, overriding the Engaged server settings that limit characters to the Windows-1252 extended ASCII character set. It also provides an automatic translation of your text posts into ASCII for compatibility with users who can't view Unicode. A feature for simple posting of images is also included.
